title: Facilities Director
label: Facilities Director
description: Leads enterprise facilities strategy and operations including maintenance, energy management, space planning, vendor relationships, and safety/security across all corporate and site locations.
responsibilities: Oversee maintenance, energy, and space management
Manage facilities budget and vendor relationships
traditionalWorkflow: React to equipment failures after downtime occurs
Review energy bills monthly (too late to optimize)
Annual space planning based on headcount only
Vendor performance reviews annual (if at all)
Quarterly safety audits with manual reporting
agenticWorkflow: Predictive maintenance prevents 40-60% of equipment failures
Real-time energy dashboards enable immediate optimization
Continuous space utilization tracking informs proactive planning
Vendor scorecards updated real-time with performance data
Continuous safety monitoring with instant incident alerts

title: Facilities Operations Manager
label: Facilities Operations Manager
description: Manages day-to-day facilities operations including work order management, preventive maintenance, vendor coordination, and ensuring asset availability and performance.
responsibilities: Oversee work order management and technician dispatch
traditionalWorkflow: Manually assign work orders to technicians
Track PM completion in spreadsheets (60-70% completion)
Call vendors to schedule repairs (delayed response)
Review work order backlog weekly (500-2,000 open tickets)
Investigate equipment failures reactively
agenticWorkflow: AI auto-assigns work orders based on skills and proximity
PM scheduling automated with 95%+ completion tracking
Vendor work orders auto-created and tracked
Real-time work order dashboard shows backlog trends
Predictive maintenance identifies failures before they occur

title: Energy & Sustainability Manager
label: Energy & Sustainability Manager
description: Manages energy consumption, utility costs, and sustainability programs to reduce carbon footprint and achieve net-zero goals while optimizing operational expenses.
responsibilities: Manage utility accounts and bill validation
Drive sustainability and carbon reduction initiatives
traditionalWorkflow: Review utility bills monthly in spreadsheets
Calculate carbon footprint annually in Excel
Identify energy projects sporadically
No real-time energy visibility
Sustainability reporting manual (weeks of work)
agenticWorkflow: Real-time energy monitoring by building and equipment
Automated carbon calculations updated continuously
AI prioritizes energy projects by ROI and carbon impact
HVAC and lighting optimized automatically based on occupancy
Sustainability reports auto-generated monthly

title: Workplace Services Director
label: Workplace Services Director
description: Manages workplace experience including space planning, hoteling, conference room management, and amenities to optimize real estate costs and employee satisfaction.
responsibilities: Manage hoteling and flexible workspace programs
Track and optimize real estate costs
traditionalWorkflow: Space allocation fixed by department (no flexibility)
Conference room bookings via email (double-bookings)
Move requests take 2-4 weeks to process
No occupancy tracking (unknown utilization)
Space planning reactive (add space when out of room)
agenticWorkflow: Real-time occupancy tracking informs space decisions
Hoteling app enables flexible desk/office reservations
Conference room auto-releases no-shows
Move requests auto-coordinated with IT and facilities
Space forecasting predicts needs 6-12 months ahead

title: Safety & Security Manager
label: Safety & Security Manager
description: Manages workplace safety programs and physical security operations to protect employees, assets, and facilities from incidents, threats, and regulatory violations.
responsibilities: Oversee physical security operations (guards, cameras, access)
Manage workplace safety programs and compliance
Coordinate emergency response and incident management
Report safety and security metrics to leadership
traditionalWorkflow: Security guards patrol manually with paper logs
Video footage reviewed after incidents (1-4 hours search)
Safety inspections periodic (quarterly/annual)
Incident reports handwritten on paper
Safety training annual with 70-80% completion
agenticWorkflow: AI video analytics monitors all cameras 24/7
Incidents detected and alerted in real-time (3-10 min response)
Digital safety inspections with photo verification
Incident reports auto-generated with video evidence
Safety training auto-assigned with 95%+ completion tracking
painPointsAddressed: Incident response time reduced 70% (3-10 min vs 10-30 min)
Video search time reduced 90% (AI finds footage)
